message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal for a product worth much more. What do you think?
Alice,  I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to go up to $12000 at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my desired price.  I'm willing to drop my price to $13500. This is a good compromise, and I'm sure you'll find it to be a great value for your money.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but I'm still sticking to my maximum of $12000. This is a fair price for both of us, and it avoids having to involve a third party.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my desired price.  I'm willing to drop my price to $13000.  This is a good compromise, and I'm sure you'll find it to be a great value for your money.
